ygData.subject: Re: Hrmmm..
ygData.msgSnippet: Both Dirty Tricks are bannable?  Or just the Bind?  Either way, YAY! ... ______________________________________________________ Get your free web-based email
ygData.messageBody:
Both Dirty Tricks are bannable? Or just the Bind? Either way, YAY!

"Godley, Evie Ward" wrote:
> >From: "Godley, Evie Ward" <GODLEYE@...>
>
> Acutally this is a bannable offense. GM's have been broadcasting on servers
> recently about this. I would be very cautious of this If your guilty of it.
>
>
> > Speaking of what some SOB could do to you:
> >
> > Someone could "bind affinity" to you where you would get killed after
> > getting killed.
> >
> > If you have a pet and someone makes you invisible, the pet goes away.
> >
> >
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Are you hogging all the fun?
> http://www.ONElist.com
> Friends tell friends about ONElist!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> For more information on how to join the best roleplaying game on the net goto www.everquest.com
>
